name: DeviceRequest
title: DeviceRequest
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Orders and Observations)
description: Represents a request for a patient to employ a medical device. The device may be an implantable device, or an external assistive device, such as a walker.

elements.name: DeviceRequest
elements.description: Represents a request for a patient to employ a medical device.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifiers assigned to this order by the orderer or by the order fulfiller.

elements.name: instantiatesCanonical
elements.description: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this DeviceRequest.

elements.name: instantiatesUri
elements.description: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this DeviceRequest.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

elements.name: priorRequest
elements.description: The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

elements.name: groupIdentifier
elements.description: Composite request this is part of.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the request.

elements.name: intent
elements.description: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: Indicates how quickly the device request should be addressed with respect to other requests.

elements.name: codeReference
elements.description: The details of the device to be used.

elements.name: codeCodeableConcept
elements.description: The details of the device to be used.

elements.name: parameter
elements.description: Specific parameters for the ordered device.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The patient who will use the device.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: An encounter that provides additional context in which this request is made.

elements.name: occurrenceDateTime
elements.description: The timing or schedule for the use of the device.

elements.name: occurrencePeriod
elements.description: The timing or schedule for the use of the device.

elements.name: occurrenceTiming
elements.description: The timing or schedule for the use of the device.

elements.name: authoredOn
elements.description: When the request transitioned to being actionable.

elements.name: requester
elements.description: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

elements.name: performerType
elements.description: Desired type of performer for doing the diagnostic testing.

elements.name: performer
elements.description: The desired performer for doing the diagnostic testing.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Reason or justification for the use of this device.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Reason or justification for the use of this device.

elements.name: insurance
elements.description: Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be required for delivering the requested service.

elements.name: supportingInfo
elements.description: Additional clinical information about the patient that may influence the request fulfilment.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Details about this request that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class.

elements.name: relevantHistory
elements.description: Key events in the history of the request.
